headline: How Investors May Respond To Enphase Energy (ENPH) Securities Class Actions Over Alleged Disclosures
summary: In February 2026, multiple investor law firms announced securities class action lawsuits against Enphase Energy and certain executives, alleging false and misleading statements about channel inventory management and the company’s ability to handle the impact of the expired 25D homeowner tax credit during the April 22, 2025 to October 28, 2025 period. The growing number of parallel lawsuits raises the prospect of extended legal scrutiny of Enphase’s disclosures and risk controls at the same...
